Dm_RT_0014_Text_033_b_05: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TuliNotice_00>OK, I heard it for sure this time.<sp:0:4:0>It was calling out to me loud and clear!
Dm_RT_0014_Text_016_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Looks like it's shut tight. But the source
of the blizzard has gotta be right under
that hatch!
Dm_RT_0014_Text_033_b_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0601>The source of the blizzard messing up the
village has gotta be <clr:0000>under this hatch<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If that voice was right, <clr:0000>it'll open <clr:ffff>once we
<clr:0000>find a way to release all five locks<clr:ffff>.
Dm_RT_0014_Text_033_b_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:Determination_00>We're so close!<sp:0:4:0>C'mon, Link. Let's go figure out how to
open up those <clr:0000>locks<clr:ffff>!
Dm_RT_0014_Text_016_b_00: <sp:3:0:2:0c01>Isn't there some way we can get it open?
Dm_RT_0014_Text_020_b:
There are still five locks securing the
hatch on the deck.
Dm_RT_0014_Text_021_b:
Use your power to release all five locks
and the hatch should open.
